amendment.description: To provide for the delivery of flags through Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 683 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 683 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR 5/15/2003 S6568; text: CR 5/15/2003 S6568) To provide for the delivery of flags through Congress.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 683 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 683 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
